Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, surrounded by corn and wheat.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road, you can see the large Klondike Wheat Fields, where acres and acres of wheat are harvested. On the west side of the road are DeNail's Corn Fields, where enough corn is grown to easily feed all of Oceancrest and many other small cities in the lands. The entrance to the fields is to the south off of Lankshire Parkway.
